title: Robot-Assisted Digital Storytelling-Based Professional English Communication Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Grammar and Understanding of Job-Related Terminology
context.additional_context: Job-specific English communication training for mid-level professionals in medical/legal/technical fields. Includes real-work simulations through robot collaboration and storytelling-based learning

learning_goals: Learners can create domain-specific English storytelling scripts with over 80% accuracy through collaborative robot-assisted activities.
Learners can appropriately use over 50 job-specific vocabulary terms in role-playing scenarios on human-robot interaction platforms.
Learners can improve oral presentation fluency (30% reduction in speech disfluencies) and accuracy using robot feedback systems.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
